commitResults.messageTitle: Add Deadline, Todo, Event classes Changed flow of chatbot to switch commands
Changed indexing to only in list command
Added todo, deadline, event command checks Changed todo, deadline, event to work properly
Added input and expected texts for testing Fixed bug regarding whitespace for case "deadline" and case "event"
Added Handle Errors Updated textUI testing for exceptions

commitResults.messageBody:
Give users an option to save their tasklist.

Saving tasklists will make using the bot easier and users do not need
to re-create a list they previously made.

Key Changes:
* Load existing tasklist from Tanjy.txt on startup, or create a new file
if none exists
* Add lineToTaskParser to convert saved file lines into Task objects
* Add save command to write the current task list back to file
* Add taskType variable (T, D, E) to identify task types during
parsing
* Add getters and setters for taskType
* Override for getName in Todo, Deadline and Event for ease of adding
String into .txt file

Teach the chatbot to understand date and times for tasks.

Key Changes:
* Added parseDateTime to convert Strings to LocalDateTime
* Changed String variables to LocalDateTime in Deadline class, Event
class, and parsers in Tanjy

New Ui class that contains all print methods.

Consolidated all strings to be printed that into one class for ease of
viewing and editing.

New Storage class that contains load and save logic.

Moved code for loading and saving files into this class. Use the
appropriate methods in new Storage class when saving or loading.

New Parser class for parser methods.

Moved all parser methods to another class for ease of use and viewing.

New TaskList class for methods related to changing the tasklist.

Any changes to commands can be made in this class instead of in Tanjy.
The main logic in Tanjy was also changed to make the code more OOP.

Tasks were being appended multiple times when loading from disk.
This change ensures the saved list is loaded only once.
Organize classes into ui, parser, storage, and task packages.

Set up Gradle build and move Tanjy into the tanjy package
so the application can be run via Gradle.

ParserTest and TaskListTest added to test for correct logic in methods
of classes Parser and TaskList.

Methods tested:
* parser.parseDateTime
* list.addToDo
* list.getTask
* list.markTask
* list.delete

Added JavaDoc comments to all non-private classes/methods and non-
trivial private methods.

Added find command to find tasks based on keyword.

Key Changes:
* Added findTasks to Tasklist
* Added printMatchingTasks to Ui
* Added case "find" in Tanjy

Added the GUI for users to see the chatbot on a separate window that
looks cleaner and nicer.

Key Changes:
*Add GUI classes (Main, Gui, DialogBox, Launcher)
*Move command handling into getResponse()
*Changed logic of print methods in Ui
*Changed logic of mark/unmark handling in Tanjy

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor command parsing to use CommandType enum
commitResults.messageBody:
Replaced magic strings with enum
Removed TextUI implementation

Added handlers for different commands in Tanjy
Removed redundant methods used in previous TextUI
Removed magic literals in TaskList
Made internal task list field final to prevent reassignment

* branch-A-CodeQuality:
  Improve Code Quality
  Refactor command parsing to use CommandType enum

# Conflicts:
#	src/main/java/tanjy/parser/Parser.java

commitResults.messageTitle: Add B-Snooze extension for Deadline and Event
commitResults.messageBody:
Key Changes:
*Added SNOOZE to CommandType
*Added handleSnooze() in Tanjy
*Implemented snoozeDeadline() and snoozeEvent() in TaskList
*Added validation to ensure new date/time is later than the original

* branch-B-Snooze:
  Add B-Snooze extension for Deadline and Event

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor Tanjy class for dependency injection and improve error handling
commitResults.messageBody:
Key Changes:
*Updated initFromStorage to provide more meaningful error messages
*Refactored task parsing logic into a helper method
*Improved `handleEvent` method by removing redundant split logic
*Replaced magic strings in TaskList with instanceof checks for better
type safety and future-proofing.
*Updated storage logic to ensure directory creation if the path does
not exist, preventing potential file creation errors.

Fix bugs and update User Guide
commitResults.messageBody:
Key Changes:

*Added User Guide with appropriate commands and expected outputs
